title: Fit Tea 28 Day Detox
description: Fit Tea is a loose leaf tea that contains a powerful blend of Organic Green Tea, Oolong Wu Yi, Garcinia Cambogia Extract and more.
cleaned_text: results, drinking Fit Tea needs to be paired up with healthy eating and daily exercising. Steep in 8oz. of hot water for 5-7 minutes. Drink once or twice daily to kickstart your metabolism. Enjoy your Detox hot or add ice to enjoy cold.
